summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation of Forty-fifth Avenue South, from Brandon Street to Bennett Street, and of Bennett Street from Forty-fifth Avenue South to the west line of Tract Seventeen (17), of Columbia Heights, an addition to the City of Seattle, as provided in Ordinance No. 45594, of the City of Seattle, and repealing Ordinance No. 46920.
